name: dibble
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a
dibber : I use a dibble to make a hole and insert the cutting. A pencil, large nail or sharpened piece of dowel makes an ideal dibble.
Dorling Kindersley%3A John Spence/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesA dibble, also called a planting bar, helps make quick-and-easy work of hand-planting trees.Loosen the seedling in the soil with a small dibble held in one hand. She was planting seeds with a dibble.
